definitions.definition: One who teaches another (usually called a student , learner , or tutee ) in a one-on-one or small-group interaction.
examples: He passed the difficult class with help from his tutor .

definitions.definition: ( UK ) A university officer responsible for students in a particular hall .
( obsolete or Quebec law ) One who has the charge of a child or pupil and his estate; a guardian .

main_definition: One who teaches another (usually called a student , learner , or tutee ) in a one-on-one or small-group interaction.
secondary_definitions: ( UK ) A university officer responsible for students in a particular hall .
( obsolete or Quebec law ) One who has the charge of a child or pupil and his estate; a guardian .

definitions.definition: A card that allows one to search one's deck for one or more other cards.

main_definition: ( collectible card games ) A card that allows one to search one's deck for one or more other cards.
